name: io.github.yokingma/one-search-mcp
description: One Search MCP Server, Web Search & Crawl & Scraper & Extract, support agent-browser, SearXNG, Tavily, DuckDuckGo, Bing, etc.

environmentVariables.description: Search provider to use (searxng, tavily, bing, duckduckgo, local)
environmentVariables.name: SEARCH_PROVIDER

environmentVariables.description: API URL for SearXNG (required if using searxng provider)
environmentVariables.name: SEARCH_API_URL

environmentVariables.description: API key for search provider (required for tavily, bing)
environmentVariables.name: SEARCH_API_KEY
